creator: Token App Limited
descriptionHtml:
Start living life on Ethereum with Monolith!

Securely store ETH & selected ERC-20 tokens in your own decentralised Contract Wallet. Spend them with your Visa debit card.
The Contract Wallet is non-custodial and 100% decentralised. Stay in control of your own assets with Monolith.
Use Monolith to convert your ETH and ERC-20 tokens to fiat and spend freely with your Visa debit card wherever Visa is accepted — 45 million merchants worldwide.

Dive into Monolith’s services:

• Manage your cryptocurrencies with our industry leading decentralised Contract Wallet
• Securely store, send and receive ETH & ERC20 tokens in the Contract Wallet
• Easily check your balances and transaction history
• Send cryptocurrency to anyone, anywhere in the world.
• Stay in control of your private keys, which never leave your phone.

Stay safe and secure

• Your Seed is your key: backup and restore on any device
• Register and set Daily Withdrawal Limits to protect your assets in case your seed is compromised.
• Keep your tokens safe in our triple-audited Smart Contract Wallet

Spend your cryptocurrencies with Monolith

• Link your app to our contactless and chip & PIN Visa card, accepted globally wherever Visa is accepted — online or offline
• Seamlessly convert your cryptocurrency to fiat and pre-load your Monolith Visa debit card for quick and easy spending
• Access fair and transparent rates
• Freeze your card instantly if you misplace it

The Monolith Visa debit card is accepted globally but currently only available for EEA residents (that’s 31 countries within Europe). More territories coming soon!

If you’re having issues or have feedback please contact us at support@monolith.xyz
descriptionShort: Start living life on Ethereum with Monolith!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• You can once again upload proof-of-address documents when applying for a card.
• Bug fixes and other improvements.

title: Monolith — Ethereum Wallet

creator: Token App Limited
descriptionHtml:
The Monolith DeFi account: use it to spend, swap, save and borrow - all in one place. It’s the world’s first non-custodial wallet linked to a Visa debit card, giving you the functionality of Visa with the independence of Ethereum.

It’s simple, elegant and useful.


MONOLITH VISA DEBIT CARD

One (Free) Card –no staking, no tiers, no hassle
Spend Globally – Our card is accepted in 45m+ terminals worldwide
Rewards (Coming Soon) – Earn money back on everyday purchases

MONOLITH DeFI ACCOUNT

Swap – At the market rate with a Dex aggregator, and experience no rate markup
Spend – Your favorite ETH and ERC-20 tokens effortlessly
Earn – Interest on stablecoins while storing them in a wallet you control
Borrow (Coming soon) – against your assets and harness the full power of DeFi
Put Money In- (Coming soon) – get a regular Sort Code and Account Number, or European IBAN and receive payments directly into stablecoins


CONTROL AND SECURITY

Non-Custodial - we don’t hold your assets, as long as Ethereum nodes are running, nothing can stop you.
Spend Limits – Set limits on your account to hedge against unwanted access
Security – Biometric Authentication adds another level of security to your login and transaction signing
White Lists – Set up to 5 whitelisted addresses with no transfer limits to ‘drain and retain’ effortlessly


If you’re having issues or have feedback, please contact us at support@monolith.xyz
descriptionShort: Your Gateway To The New Economy
title: Monolith — Ethereum Wallet

creator: Token App Limited
descriptionHtml:
Simple to Use. Rooted in Security. Built for a new type of Finance


Why a monolith DeFi Account?


A GATEWAY TO A NEW ECONOMY

Whether its storing assets, spending ERC20 tokens, or leveraging the power of Ethereum Dapps - Monolith is a DeFi account with simplicity at its core.

UNRIVALLED SECURITY

The security we offer is unrivalled: choose your wallet spend limits, set up to 5 whitelisted addresses to ‘drain and retain’ in seconds, enjoy Biometric Authentication on your login and transaction signing.

Want to check and verify our code or read our external security audits - You can find them, on the front page of our site (Monolith.xyz)


YOUR FUNDS ARE YOURS

Be part of the DeFi economy while retaining ownership of your assets. As long as Ethereum nodes are running, nothing can stop you.


A SOLUTION NOT A PRODUCT

No staking, no tiers, no hassle. We give you an account with IBAN (coming soon) to add money into your account, Swaps to hold any token you want, and a Visa Card accepted at 45m+ terminals worldwide.

When we say simple and hassle-free, we mean it.

title: Monolith — Ethereum Wallet

creator: Token App Limited
descriptionHtml:
Monolith harnesses the power of Ethereum to enable a bankless life. The Monolith Account is an unstoppable checking and saving account ready for decentralised finance:

• Store and secure ETH & ERC-20 tokens in your • Monolith Account. (Soon: Purchase tokens straight from the app with SEPA.)
• Easily spend your tokens anywhere with the Monolith Visa Debit Card.
• Use the mobile application to store, swap and spend your tokens and manage your card in one single place
• The Monolith Contract Wallet notarizes your relationship with your account on the Ethereum network & secure your tokens.


Monolith Visa Debit Card:

Monolith is an Ethereum-powered solution allowing you to spend your tokens (ETH and ERC-20) in real-life, the way you're used to: with a debit card accepted anywhere. With the Monolith app, you easily convert your tokens (cryptocurrencies) into fiat ready to be spent on your card. We call it "topping-up" your card, and it takes just a few blocks confirmation (~45s).

Monolith cards are available to any resident of the EEA (includes the whole European Union) and work worldwide. You can apply for a card and manage it directly using the Monolith app. To order the card, you need to confirm your identity (KYC procedure) and your location with a proof of address document, such as a utility bill. The app walks you through the application process.

You can currently top-up your Monolith card with the following tokens:
ETH, TKN, USDC, DAI, USDT, KNC, MKR, DGD, GUSD, MATIC, RLC, DGX, SAI, & NPXS.

The Monolith card works with Google Pay and supports contactless payments (NFC).


Monolith Contract Wallet:

Your Monolith Account is secured by a with a non-custodial contract wallet only you control. Each new user deploys their own instance of the Monolith contract wallet. Your contract wallet enables advanced security features, such as spending limits and trusted addresses list to further enhance your tokens' safety.

These security features at enforced at the Ethereum network level, independently of Monolith. Your Monolith Account is 100% yours - governed by your seed phrase. You can use it to recover your assets, without needing any help from us.

We take the necessary steps to make sure the security of the contract wallet is state of the art, including several audits and an ongoing bug bounty program


Your Monolith Account:

With the Monolith app, you can conveniently store and secure the most common ERC-20 tokens. From here, you can check their balances, send & receive from and to anyone, anywhere in the world and exchanges tokens (swap).

The Monolith App uses ParaSwap, a service aggregating several decentralised exchanges such as Uniswap, Curve Finance, or Kyber. For each trades, prices are checked on up to 7 services, that can be mix and matched together to find the best possible routing, resulting in the best rate for you.

If you’re having issues or have feedback please contact us at support@monolith.xyz

The Monolith App uses ParaSwap, a service aggregating several decentralised exchanges such as Uniswap, Curve Finance, or Kyber. For each trades, prices are checked on up to 7 services, that can be mix and matched together to find the best possible routing, resulting in the best rate for you.

If you’re having issues or have feedback please contact us at support@monolith.xyz
descriptionShort: Start living life on Ethereum with Monolith!
title: Monolith — Ethereum Wallet

creator: Token App Limited
descriptionHtml:
Start living life on Ethereum with Monolith!

Securely store ETH & selected ERC-20 tokens in your own decentralised Contract Wallet. Spend them with your Visa debit card.
The Contract Wallet is non-custodial and 100% decentralised. Stay in control of your own assets with Monolith.
Use Monolith to convert your ETH and ERC-20 tokens to fiat and spend freely with your Visa debit card wherever Visa is accepted — 45 million merchants worldwide.

Dive into Monolith’s services:

• Manage your cryptocurrencies with our industry leading decentralised Contract Wallet
• Securely store, send and receive ETH & ERC20 tokens in the Contract Wallet
• Easily check your balances and transaction history
• Send cryptocurrency to anyone, anywhere in the world.
• Stay in control of your private keys, which never leave your phone.

Stay safe and secure

• Your Seed is your key: backup and restore on any device
• Register and set Daily Withdrawal Limits to protect your assets in case your seed is compromised.
• Keep your tokens safe in our triple-audited Smart Contract Wallet

Spend your cryptocurrencies with Monolith

• Link your app to our contactless and chip & PIN Visa card, accepted globally wherever Visa is accepted — online or offline
• Seamlessly convert your cryptocurrency to fiat and pre-load your Monolith Visa debit card for quick and easy spending
• Access fair and transparent rates
• Freeze your card instantly if you misplace it

The Monolith Visa debit card is accepted globally but currently only available for EEA residents (that’s 31 countries within Europe). More territories coming soon!

If you’re having issues or have feedback please contact us at support@monolith.xyz

Monolith Visa Debit Card:

Monolith is an Ethereum-powered solution allowing you to spend your tokens (ETH and ERC-20) in real-life, the way you're used to: with a debit card accepted anywhere. With the Monolith app, you easily convert your tokens (cryptocurrencies) into fiat ready to be spent on your card. We call it "topping-up" your card, and it takes just a few blocks confirmation (~45s).

Monolith cards are available to any resident of the EEA (includes the whole European Union) and work worldwide. You can apply for a card and manage it directly using the Monolith app. To order the card, you need to confirm your identity (KYC procedure) and your location with a proof of address document, such as a utility bill. The app walks you through the application process.

You can currently top-up your Monolith card with the following tokens:
ETH, TKN, USDC, DAI, USDT, KNC, MKR, DGD, GUSD, MATIC, RLC, DGX, SAI, & NPXS.

The Monolith card works with Google Pay and supports contactless payments (NFC).


Monolith Contract Wallet:

Your Monolith Account is secured by a with a non-custodial contract wallet only you control. Each new user deploys their own instance of the Monolith contract wallet. Your contract wallet enables advanced security features, such as spending limits and trusted addresses list to further enhance your tokens' safety.

These security features at enforced at the Ethereum network level, independently of Monolith. Your Monolith Account is 100% yours - governed by your seed phrase. You can use it to recover your assets, without needing any help from us.

We take the necessary steps to make sure the security of the contract wallet is state of the art, including several audits and an ongoing bug bounty program

With the Monolith app, you can conveniently store and secure the most common ERC-20 tokens. From here, you can check their balances, send & receive from and to anyone, anywhere in the world and exchanges tokens (swap).

The Monolith App uses ParaSwap, a service aggregating several decentralised exchanges such as Uniswap, Curve Finance, or Kyber. For each trades, prices are checked on up to 7 services, that can be mix and matched together to find the best possible routing, resulting in the best rate for you.

If you’re having issues or have feedback please contact us at support@monolith.xyz

title: Monolith — Ethereum Wallet

creator: Token App Limited
descriptionHtml:
Monolith harnesses the power of Ethereum to enable a bankless life. The Monolith Account is an unstoppable checking and saving account ready for decentralised finance:

• Store and secure ETH & ERC-20 tokens in your • Monolith Account. (Soon: Purchase tokens straight from the app with SEPA.)
• Easily spend your tokens anywhere with the Monolith Visa Debit Card.
• Use the mobile application to store, swap and spend your tokens and manage your card in one single place
• The Monolith Contract Wallet notarizes your relationship with your account on the Ethereum network & secure your tokens.


Monolith Visa Debit Card:

Monolith is an Ethereum-powered solution allowing you to spend your tokens (ETH and ERC-20) in real-life, the way you're used to: with a debit card accepted anywhere. With the Monolith app, you easily convert your tokens (cryptocurrencies) into fiat ready to be spent on your card. We call it "topping-up" your card, and it takes just a few blocks confirmation (~45s).

Monolith cards are available to any resident of the EEA (includes the whole European Union) and work worldwide. You can apply for a card and manage it directly using the Monolith app. To order the card, you need to confirm your identity (KYC procedure) and your location with a proof of address document, such as a utility bill. The app walks you through the application process.

You can currently top-up your Monolith card with the following tokens:
ETH, TKN, USDC, DAI, USDT, KNC, MKR, DGD, GUSD, MATIC, RLC, DGX, SAI, & NPXS.

The Monolith card works with Google Pay and supports contactless payments (NFC).


Monolith Contract Wallet:

Your Monolith Account is secured by a with a non-custodial contract wallet only you control. Each new user deploys their own instance of the Monolith contract wallet. Your contract wallet enables advanced security features, such as spending limits and trusted addresses list to further enhance your tokens' safety.

These security features at enforced at the Ethereum network level, independently of Monolith. Your Monolith Account is 100% yours - governed by your seed phrase. You can use it to recover your assets, without needing any help from us.

We take the necessary steps to make sure the security of the contract wallet is state of the art, including several audits and an ongoing bug bounty program


Your Monolith Account:

With the Monolith app, you can conveniently store and secure the most common ERC-20 tokens. From here, you can check their balances, send & receive from and to anyone, anywhere in the world and exchanges tokens (swap).

The Monolith App uses ParaSwap, a service aggregating several decentralised exchanges such as Uniswap, Curve Finance, or Kyber. For each trades, prices are checked on up to 7 services, that can be mix and matched together to find the best possible routing, resulting in the best rate for you.

If you’re having issues or have feedback please contact us at support@monolith.xyz

creator: Token App Limited
descriptionHtml:
Enter the Monolith and unlock the power of decentralised finance on Ethereum.

Monolith is the world’s first DeFi wallet and accompanying Visa Debit Card made for spending crypto assets in the real world.

When you join us, you get access to:

Smart Contract Wallet – a non-custodial, fully decentralised wallet built on Ethereum.

Visa Debit Card – a contactless Chip & Pin Visa card for converting your crypto assets to spend anywhere Visa is accepted worldwide.

Money in – exchange your fiat for crypto with any Visa or Mastercard at zero fees (the best rate on the market).

Send, receive and store crypto – use your wallet to receive and store tokens, and send crypto anywhere in the world.

DeFi at your fingertips – interact with DeFi thanks via our integrated token swap feature combining Ethereum’s leading decentralised exchange protocols.

Earn – receive interest on stablecoins stored in your smart contract wallet.

Advanced security measures – our security features include Whitelisted Addresses, Daily Send Limit, Daily Gas Limit and Biometric Identification to help you keep your digital assets safe.

Monolith is your portal to the decentralised future. A movement is under way, and the journey starts now.

Enter the Monolith and unlock the power of decentralised finance on Ethereum.

Monolith is the world’s first DeFi wallet and accompanying Visa Debit Card made for spending crypto assets anywhere.

When you join us, you get access to:
• Smart Contract Wallet – a non-custodial, fully decentralised wallet built on Ethereum.
• Visa Debit Card – a contactless Chip & Pin Visa card for converting your crypto assets to spend anywhere Visa is accepted worldwide.
• Money in – exchange your fiat for crypto with any Visa or Mastercard. We offer some of the most competitive fees on the market for buying crypto.
• Send, receive and store crypto – use your wallet to receive and store tokens, and send crypto anywhere in the world.
• DeFi at your fingertips – interact with DeFi via our integrated token swap feature combining Ethereum’s leading decentralised exchange protocols.
• Explore – find assets that can help you earn interest in real time, purchase stablecoins, and get exposure to key DeFi projects via our Explore Tokens feature.
• Advanced security measures – our security features include Whitelisted Addresses, Daily Send Limit, Daily Gas Limit and Biometric Identification to help you keep your digital assets safe.

Monolith is your portal to the decentralised future. A movement is under way, and the journey starts now.

• Send, receive and store crypto – use your wallet to receive and store tokens, and send crypto anywhere in the world.
• DeFi at your fingertips – interact with DeFi via our integrated token swap feature combining Ethereum’s leading decentralised exchange protocols.
• Explore – find assets that can help you earn interest in real time, purchase stablecoins, and get exposure to key DeFi projects via our Explore Tokens feature.
• Advanced security measures – our security features include Whitelisted Addresses, Daily Send Limit, Daily Gas Limit and Biometric Identification to help you keep your digital assets safe.

Monolith is your portal to the decentralised future. A movement is under way, and the journey starts now.
